name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D LIVE - HOPE UPON A STAR 】IRyS 2025 BIRTHDAY LIVE #IRySBDay2025 [V0plPBgyqPs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: IRyS and guests (Kronii, Mumei, Baelz, Botan) perform 'Choo Choo TRAIN'.
MC section where IRyS thanks her guests and announces her new EP 'YaBAI'.

subtitles.original: Fun Fun We hit the step step
subtitles.english: Fun Fun We hit the step step

subtitles.original: Keep your doubts to yourself we know we love all
subtitles.english: Keep your doubts to yourself we know we love all

subtitles.original: Heat Heat beats like a skip skip
subtitles.english: Heat Heat beats like a skip skip

subtitles.original: To the paradise Take me please Choo Choo TRAIN
subtitles.english: To the paradise Take me please Choo Choo TRAIN

subtitles.original: 変わりそうもない Scene
subtitles.english: A scene that doesn't seem to change

subtitles.original: 追いかけまわしたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep chasing after it

subtitles.original: 出かけよう この
subtitles.english: Let's head out into this

subtitles.original: 永遠に Say Good-bye
subtitles.english: Eternity, say Good-bye

subtitles.original: ビルの Upside down oh
subtitles.english: Buildings upside down oh

subtitles.original: 街は All around round
subtitles.english: The city is all around round

subtitles.original: 抜け出して
subtitles.english: Breaking free

subtitles.original: 始めるのさ Good Trip
subtitles.english: We're starting a Good Trip

subtitles.original: Fun Fun We hit the step step
subtitles.english: Fun Fun We hit the step step

subtitles.english: Look, from the window, We know we love all

subtitles.original: Heat Heat beats like a skip skip
subtitles.english: Heat Heat beats like a skip skip

subtitles.original: 駆け出して 飛び乗る Choo Choo TRAIN
subtitles.english: Run out and jump on the Choo Choo TRAIN

subtitles.original: Fun Fun We hit the step step
subtitles.english: Fun Fun We hit the step step

subtitles.original: 吹き抜ける風 We know we love all
subtitles.english: The breeze blowing through, We know we love all

subtitles.original: Heat Heat beats like a skip skip
subtitles.english: Heat Heat beats like a skip skip

subtitles.original: ときめきを運ぶ Choo Choo TRAIN
subtitles.english: Carrying the excitement, Choo Choo TRAIN

subtitles.original: Fun Fun We hit the step step
subtitles.english: Fun Fun We hit the step step

subtitles.original: 窓辺からほら We know we love all
subtitles.english: Look, from the window, We know we love all

subtitles.original: Heat Heat beats like a skip skip
subtitles.english: Heat Heat beats like a skip skip

subtitles.original: 駆け出して 飛び乗る Choo Choo TRAIN
subtitles.english: Run out and jump on the Choo Choo TRAIN

subtitles.original: Thanks everyone!
subtitles.english: Thanks everyone!

subtitles.original: And that was Choo Choo TRAIN with my lovely guests!
subtitles.english: And that was Choo Choo TRAIN with my lovely guests!

subtitles.original: But, we still have one more song to go.
subtitles.english: But, we still have one more song to go.

subtitles.original: ライブもね、残りあと1曲になってしまいました。
subtitles.english: We only have one song left in the live performance.

subtitles.original: But you guys want an encore, don't you? Of course you do.
subtitles.english: But you guys want an encore, don't you? Of course you do.

subtitles.original: まだまだライブ見たいよね？ Of course you do.
subtitles.english: You still want to see more of the live, don't you? Of course you do.

subtitles.original: After this, I have a members-only encore live,
subtitles.english: After this, I have a members-only encore live,

subtitles.original: so I would love it if you'd be able to join that for that as well.
subtitles.english: so I would love it if you'd be able to join that for that as well.

subtitles.original: この後もね、メンバーシップ限定のアンコールライブもやります！
subtitles.english: After this, I'll also be doing an encore live limited to membership!

subtitles.original: ぜひメンバーシップ入ってね！
subtitles.english: Please be sure to join the membership!

subtitles.original: So please join the family if you want to watch that! It's gonna be amazing.
subtitles.english: So please join the family if you want to watch that! It's gonna be amazing.

subtitles.original: And it's gonna have some nice songs. Yes.
subtitles.english: And it's gonna have some nice songs. Yes.

subtitles.original: 歌も歌いますんでね、ぜひ楽しみにしてて下さい。
subtitles.english: I'll be singing some songs too, so please look forward to it.

subtitles.original: Before we move on to the next song though, I have an extra... EXTRA special announcement!
subtitles.english: Before we move on to the next song though, I have an extra... EXTRA special announcement!

subtitles.original: みんなにスペシャルな、ビッグなお知らせがあります！
subtitles.english: I have a special, big announcement for everyone!

subtitles.original: I am releasing a new EP! It's been so long!
subtitles.english: I am releasing a new EP! It's been so long!

subtitles.original: IRySの新しいEPがリリースされます！すごい久しぶり、もう2年くらい？
subtitles.english: A new EP from IRyS will be released! It's been a long time, about 2 years?

subtitles.original: It's been like 2 years since my last one.
subtitles.english: It's been like 2 years since my last one.

subtitles.original: It's so nice! It's called 'YaBAI'!
subtitles.english: It's so nice! It's called 'YaBAI'!

subtitles.original: IRyS EP 「YaBAI」 YaBA Kawaii Edition
subtitles.english: IRyS EP "YaBAI" YaBA Kawaii Edition

subtitles.original: タイトルが『YaBAI』になってます。
subtitles.english: The title is "YaBAI".

subtitles.original: It features 'Carbonated Love' and four new songs.
subtitles.english: It features "Carbonated Love" and four new songs.

subtitles.original: 『Carbonated Love』と、なんと新曲4曲も入ってるEPになっています。
subtitles.english: It's an EP that includes "Carbonated Love" and, would you believe it, 4 new songs.

subtitles.original: The concept is Eurobeat, if you haven't noticed, and Dance. Yes.
subtitles.english: The concept is Eurobeat, if you haven't noticed, and Dance. Yes.

subtitles.original: IRyS EP 「YaBAI」 YaBA CHIC Edition
subtitles.english: IRyS EP "YaBAI" YaBA CHIC Edition

subtitles.original: It's very Euro-y in general, though.
subtitles.english: It's very Euro-y in general, though.

subtitles.original: And the digital release will be on July 12th midnight JST,
subtitles.english: And the digital release will be on July 12th midnight JST,

subtitles.original: which will be the 11th in the States. Yes.
subtitles.english: which will be the 11th in the States. Yes.

subtitles.original: コンセプトがユーロ系になっています。
subtitles.english: The concept is Euro-style.

subtitles.original: もうとってもね、車に合うようなEPになっています。
subtitles.english: It's an EP that really suits being in a car.

subtitles.original: えーっと、デジタルリリースが7月12日の、えー、0時で、はい！
subtitles.english: Um, the digital release is on July 12th at, uh, midnight, yes!
